definition: Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev (1834-1907), Russian chemist who introduced the periodic table

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: 869, Mendeleev, here is a picture of him taken from that period.
sentences.chinese: 869年，門捷列夫，這是他那個時期的照片。

sentences.english: They support the 130-year-old idea of their countryman Dmitri Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 他們支持他們同胞門捷列夫有130年曆史的觀點。

sentences.english: But mathematicians are still to have their Mendeleev moment.
sentences.chinese: 但是數學家們仍然學要他們的門捷列夫。

sentences.english: According to Mendeleyev's periodic table , there seem to be still some elements undiscovered yet .
sentences.chinese: 按照門捷列夫週期表，似乎還有一些元素尚未發現。

sentences.english: It has a lot, of course, about Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 當然，有很多關於門捷列夫的內容。

sentences.english: That is why we celebrate Mendeleev.
sentences.chinese: 那就是爲什麼我們要讚美門捷列夫。

sentences.english: Mendeleev, here is a picture of him taken from that period.
sentences.chinese: 869年，門捷列夫，這是他那個時期的照片。
